body: In the following reports, the "listed at" price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract. title: Residential Resales

body: The blood transfusion took place on May 23, 1984, during surgery to correct a congenital heart defect. The patient, Joey DiPaolo, was 4 years old. He got four units of red blood cells, up to seven units of frozen plasma and five units of platelets. He also got H.I.V., the virus that causes AIDS. Today, Joey DiPaolo, who was given a year and a half
title: A Question of Blood and AIDS;Infected Youth Sues Doctor Over '84 Transfusion
